docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 30--A special bonus of 12 per cent for career diplomats who request retirement from the Foreign Service by tomorrow night will bring 212 departures from the State Department by July 1.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 30--A special bonus of 12 per cent for career diplomats who request retirement from the Foreign Service by tomorrow night will bring 212 departures from the State Department by July 1.
docs.abstract: 212 career diplomats to leave Service by July 1 to qualify for special bonus; move provides chance to advance younger men; Sen com cool to State Dept request for 10 exemptions; highest-ranking diplomats who have applied for retirement listed

headline.main: FOREIGN SERVICE LOSING 212 AIDES BY RETIREMENTS; They Are Leaving by July 1 to Get Larger Pensions --New Law Is Sought FOREIGN SERVICE LOSING 212 AIDES
BRAZIL CONQUERS MEXICO IN SOCCER; Opens World Cup Bid With 2-0 Victory--Chile Wins

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, May 31 (AP) The Soviet Union, Czechoslovakia and Hungary gained narrow victories today as the first round ended in the World Soccer Cup championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, May 31 (AP) The Soviet Union, Czechoslovakia and Hungary gained narrow victories today as the first round ended in the World Soccer Cup championships.

headline.main: SOVIET TEAM WINS IN WORLD SOCCER; Topples Yugoslavia, 2-0  Hungary Beats England

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, June 1 (AP)--Trainers and coaches worked today to get their bruised and battered players into shape for the week-end's games in the world soccer championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, June 1 (AP)--Trainers and coaches worked today to get their bruised and battered players into shape for the week-end's games in the world soccer championship.
docs.abstract: referees ordered to bar rough play

headline.main: SOCCER INJURIES STIR WORLD UNIT; Committee Studying Rough Play in Championship

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, June 2 (UPI) Upsets abounded today in the World Soccer Cup championships as Yugoslavia beat Uruguay, 3 1, and Czechoslo  vakia held Brazil's defending champions to a scoreless tie.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, June 2 (UPI) Upsets abounded today in the World Soccer Cup championships as Yugoslavia beat Uruguay, 3 1, and Czechoslo vakia held Brazil's defending champions to a scoreless tie.

headline.main: Chile Wins, 2 to 0, in World Cup Soccer After 2 Italian Players Are Ejected; REFEREE PUTS OUT FERRINI AND DAVID Italians Penalized for Rough Play Yugoslavia, England in Front Brazil is Tied

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO In Brazil's Amazon basin, right on the Equator, the highest temperature  ever recorded was 97 degrees. This may come as no surprise  to the summer-hardened New Yorker, but it does point up the fact that the climate in ...

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICA HAS CLIMATE FOR ALL TASTES

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, June 3 (UPI) Colombia rallied and tied the Soviet Union, 4 4, today in World Soccer Cup competition and Mexico and Switzerland were eliminated from the championships.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, June 3 (UPI) Colombia rallied and tied the Soviet Union, 4 4, today in World Soccer Cup competition and Mexico and Switzerland were eliminated from the championships.

headline.main: SPAIN, GERMANY AND HUNGARY WIN; Mexico and Switzerland Are Put Out of Title Running in World Cup Soccer
